title: Second Wave of Hezbollah Devices Explodes in Lebanon, Killing at Least 20
content: At least 20 people were killed and more than 450 others wounded, Lebanese officials said, a day after pagers exploded across the country and killed 12 people, in an attack widely attributed to Israel.

title: Israel’s Pager Attack Was a Tactical Success Without a Strategic Goal, Analysts Say
